text: Ō wa (meijite) itta. `Kare o watashi no tokoro ni tsurete ki nasai.' Sorede tsukai ga yūsufu no tokoro ni kita toki, kare wa itta. `Anata wa hikikaeshite, ano te o kizutsuketa fujin-tachi (no shinkyō) wa dō natte iru no ka, shujin ni tazune nasai. Watashi no omo wa, ka no on'na-tachi no waru takurami o shitte ora reru
